components.name: Project Portfolio Gallery
components.description: Interactive portfolio gallery with project cards featuring titles, descriptions, navigation arrows, and 'Read more' CTAs. Includes header with demo booking link.
components.styleNotes: Clean card-based gallery with navigation controls. Works well with professional themes and business branding.

components.name: Case Studies Gallery
components.description: Image-based case studies gallery with overlay text, navigation arrows, and pagination dots. Features technology framework showcases with descriptive content.
components.styleNotes: Image-heavy gallery with text overlays. Works well with dark themes and technology-focused content.

components.name: Aceternity Parallax Scroll
components.description: Advanced parallax scrolling component with smooth animations and dynamic visual effects - perfect for showcasing images, portfolios, and immersive content experiences
components.styleNotes: Advanced parallax scroll component with smooth animations and visual effects - ideal for creating immersive gallery experiences and dynamic content showcases.

components.name: Aceternity Layout Grid
components.description: Dynamic layout grid component with interactive hover effects, responsive masonry-style layout, and smooth animations - perfect for portfolio galleries and image showcases
components.styleNotes: Advanced grid layout component with masonry-style positioning and interactive effects - ideal for creative portfolios, image galleries, and dynamic content layouts.

components.name: Aceternity Images Slider
components.description: Large photo slideshow component with smooth transitions, navigation controls, and full-screen display capabilities - perfect for showcasing high-quality images and portfolio photography
components.styleNotes: Advanced large-format image slider with smooth transitions and navigation controls - ideal for photography portfolios, product showcases, and immersive visual presentations.
